text: WWE 2K series is a series of video games that are developed by Yuke's and Visual Concepts and are published by 2K Sports. The video games are based on the professional wrestling company WWE. The series was first known as WWF/WWE SmackDown! from 2000 to 2004 and then was changed to WWE SmackDown vs. Raw in 2004. The title was changed to simply WWE in 2011 with the release of WWE '12. The WWE title was used for WWE '12 and WWE '13 and was changed to WWE 2K when Take Two Interactive acquired the publishing rights for the series from THQ. In Japan, the series was known as Exciting Pro Wrestling until 2005. The series has gained positive reviews over the years and is one of the best- selling video game franchises. The series was published by THQ from 2000 to 2013 before THQ filed for bankruptcy on December 19, 2012. THQ's assets were auctioned off and the WWE video game's publishing rights were acquired by Take Two Interactive (Parent company of 2K Games). == Games == * WWF SmackDown! (PS) (2000) * WWF SmackDown! 2: Know Your Role (PS) (2000) * WWF SmackDown! Just Bring It (PS2) (2001) * WWE SmackDown! Shut Your Mouth (PS2) (2002) * WWE SmackDown! Here Comes the Pain (PS2) (2003) * WWE SmackDown! vs. Raw (PS2) (2004) * WWE SmackDown! vs. Raw 2006 (PS2, PSP) (2005) * WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007 (PS2, PSP, Xbox 360) (2006) * WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2008 (PS2, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, Mobile, NDS) (2007) * WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2009 (PS2, PS3, PSP, Wii, Xbox 360, Mobile, NDS) (2008) * WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2010 (PS2, PS3, PSP, Wii, Xbox 360, Mobile, NDS) (2009) * WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2011 (PlayStation 2, PS3, PSP, Wii, Xbox 360) (2010) * WWE '12 (PS3, Wii, Xbox 360) (2011) * WWE '13 (PS3, Wii, Xbox 360) (2012) * WWE 2K14 (PS3, Xbox 360) (2013) * WWE 2K15 (PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One) (2014) * WWE 2K16 (PS4, PS3, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows) (2015) * WWE 2K17 (PS4, PS3, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows) (2016) * WWE 2K18 (PS4, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows) (2017) * WWE 2K19 * WWE 2K20 (PS4, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows) (2019) * WWE 2K Battlegrounds (Windows, Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, Google Stadia) * WWE 2K22 (PS4, PS5, Windows, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S) (2022) * WWE 2K23 (PS4, PS5, Windows, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S) (2023) * WWE 2K24 (PS4, PS5, Windows, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S) (2024) ==References== Category:2K games Category:Sports video games
title: WWE 2K
